Sentence.value: This makes the hand appear like the claw of an animal.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This makes the hand appear like the [[claw|C0008919]] of an [[animal|C0003043]].

Sentence.value: Someone can be born with claw hand (congenital), or they can develop it because of certain disorders, such as nerve injury.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Someone can be born with claw hand (congenital), or they can develop it because of certain [[disorders|C0012634]], such as [[nerve injury|C0161479]].
